mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as num , A.boardNum , A.writeDate , A.userId , A.userName , A.title , A.content , A.count FROM (SELECT boardNum , writeDate , userId , userName , title , content , count FROM notice, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R ORDER BY boardNum DESC ) A ) B WHERE num BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as num , A.boardNum , A.writeDate , A.userId , A.userName , A.title , A.content , A.count FROM (SELECT boardNum , writeDate , userId , userName , title , content , count FROM notice, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
WHERE userName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY boardNum DESC ) A ) B WHERE num BETWEEN #{startPage} and #{endPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice
WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
WHERE userName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
